item.title: Introducing Analytics Buckets
item.description: ğŸš€ Supabase has launched Analytics Buckets to enhance data storage for analytical workloads. These specialized storage options are built on Apache Iceberg and Amazon S3, using columnar Parquet format. They are designed for efficient data scans, aggregations, and time-series queries. Analytics Buckets enable cost-effective storage, offering savings of 30-90% compared to traditional database storage. They also support open table formats and allow for schema evolution without data rewriting….
